item.title: Asian shares skid after Wall Street tumbles to its worst day since April as China trade woes worsen

item.title: China's exports to US drop in September, while rise in global shipments hits a 6-month high
item.description: China has reported its exports to the United States fell 27% in September from the year before, even though growth in its global exports hit a six-mon...

item.title: The Nobel economics prize is set to be announced Monday

item.title: California oil workers face an uncertain future in the state's energy transition
